manifest.author: iamzainnnn
manifest.changelog:
ğŸ†• Added / Enabled  
- Enabled early access Reels creation.  
- Enabled the follow button in the Stories viewer list.  
- Enabled haunted text effects for Stories.  
- Added the ability to view group members by long-pressing the group in the Share Sheet.  
- Enabled direct threaded replies for smoother conversations.  
- Enabled avatar story mentions.  
  (You can now tag friends by adding their avatars to your Story.)  
- Enabled editable feed tabs for the Homecoming layout.  
- Enabled story reshare metadata for better tracking.  
- Introduced the Stories Live Photo feature.  
- Enabled the â€œAdd to Storyâ€ option in the Direct media viewer.  
- Added mute option for the General tab.  
  (Long press the General tab to mute it.)  
- Added new navigation options for improved in-app experience.  

ğŸƒ Seasonal / Themed  
- Tweaked and refined Halloween-related flags for a more festive appearance.  

ğŸ”„ Updated / Restored  
- Brought back the donut icon in the Explore search bar.  
- Restored the vertical toolbar on Stories for easier tool access.  
- Restored smooth animations when opening Stories.  
- Reintroduced blurred background effects while sharing feed posts and Reels to Stories.  
- Enhanced the Cutout Sticker feature for better precision.  
- Updated action buttons with a cleaner look.  
- Refined the overflow sheet for a more consistent layout.  
- Updated launcher shortcuts for faster accessibility.  
- Refreshed older flags and applied minor UI improvements.  

ğŸš« Disabled / Removed  
- Forcibly disabled prism color to maintain consistency across themes.  
- Temporarily removed the thicker progress bar in Stories.  

ğŸ› ï¸ Fixed / Improved  
- Fixed layout blank issue on certain screens.  
- Fixed Story share button not responding.  
- Fixed notification vibration issue.  
  (Now properly vibrates when receiving notifications in vibration mode.)  
- Fixed and added several minor bugs. (Still... screw Meta ğŸ˜)  

â¤ï¸ Miscellaneous  
- Switched back to the classic heart icon for notifications.  
- Improved overall performance, stability, and visuals.  
- If you encounter any bugs, please report them so I can work on fixing them as quickly as possible.
